ashita.name: Ashitav3-Release
ashita.description: The main release package of Ashita v3. Contains all the needed files for users to get up and running. Used by the launcher/injector to auto-update as well.

ahgo.name: ahgo
ahgo.description: A simple addon that allows you to browse the AH while moving/running. (Useful on private servers.)

allmaps.name: allmaps
allmaps.description: Enables players to see all maps via the /map command without owning the map key item.

antiemote.name: antiemote
antiemote.description: Removes all emotes by dropping any emote packet incoming to the client.

autorespond.name: autorespond
autorespond.description: A simple addon that will automatically respond to tells with a desired message when enabled.

blumon.name: blumon
blumon.description: Displays a colored message when you learn a Blue Magic spell. Making it easier to see when one is learned.

cfhblock.name: cfhblock
cfhblock.description: Blocks any and all forms of calling for help to prevent accidents. This addon blocks the call for help packet from ever being sent.

chamcham.name: chamcham
chamcham.description: Enables an first-person shooter ESP style hack by coloring the models of the game based on their entity type. (Default is blue for players, red for monsters, and green for NPCs.)

chatmon.name: chatmon
chatmon.description: Monitors chat and plays sounds when certain events and conditions are met.

clock.name: clock
clock.description: Clock is an addon that allows you to display times for various timezones, on-screen.

craftmon.name: craftmon
craftmon.description: Craftmon is an addon that is able to display the players craft result immediately after starting the synth. It will print out a colored message based on the result. (Normal Quality, High-Quality, or Break)

debuff.name: debuff
debuff.description: Allows players to cancel buffs/debuffs via a slash command.

drawdistance.name: drawdistance
drawdistance.description: Allows the player to alter the rendering distances of the game via slash commands.

filterless.name: filterless
filterless.description: Removes the bad language chat filter by force. (Useful for private servers as the client settings are not properly saved.)

gateway.name: gateway
gateway.description: Forces all doors to be open. (This is a cheat and can get you banned!)

gmcommand.name: gmcommand
gmcommand.description: Allows GMs on private servers to still use previous command prefixes they are used to typing instead of the current DSP default. (Accepts @ and $ for prefixes, and will replace with ! as in current DSP.)

nomad.name: nomad
nomad.description: Enables mog house functionality in any zone. (Works on private servers, partially works on retail.)

paranormal.name: paranormal
paranormal.description: Enables players to use any slash command built into the game client while dead. (Removes the 'Unable to use that command while unconscious' flag from all commands.)

skeletonkey.name: skeletonkey
skeletonkey.description: Addon that allows players to open any targeted door with a slash command.

singlerace.name: singlerace
singlerace.description: A simple addon to force all other players to a specific race.

petinfo.name: petinfo
petinfo.description: Displays information about the players pet in a simple UI window.

blusets.name: blusets
blusets.description: Manage blue magic spells simple and easy with some slash commands.

filterscan.name: filterscan
filterscan.description: Allows players to filter their widescan results, by name, to quickly and easily find their desired target.

ime.name: ime
ime.description: IME is an addon that enables the Japanese IME toolbar on any language client. This allows you to type in Japanese regardless of what language your client is set to.

imguistyle.name: imguistyle
imguistyle.description: Allows players to customize the overall UI system theme.

links.name: links
links.description: A small addon to capture and display links in a UI window that allows you to easily open them via the click of a button.

mapdot.name: mapdot
mapdot.description: Enables players to see all targets on the compass minimap regardless of what job they are on.

recast.name: recast
recast.description: Displays the players ability and spell recast information.

enternity.name: enternity
enternity.description: Removes the need to press enter during cutscenes and other dialog.

find.name: find
find.description: Allows searching for items within a players various storage containers via a slash command.

repeater.name: repeater
repeater.description: Allows a player to set a command to be repeated automatically.

pbar.name: pbar
pbar.description: Displays various information about the players current pet.

onevent.name: onevent
onevent.description: An alias based chat monitor to automatically execute commands based on chat events.

macrofix.name: macrofix
macrofix.description: An addon that alters how the macro bars show in game. Removes the delay and instead shows the bars immediately. (Original application and full credit goes to Sorien. Converted to an Ashita addon by atom0s.)

itemwatch.name: itemwatch
itemwatch.description: An addon that allows players to easily track and monitor items and key items on-screen. Useful for things such as Abyssea farming where needing multiple key items gets tedious to track. Includes a full UI editor for ease of use.

lotomatic.name: lotomatic
lotomatic.description: Treasure pool manager that can automatically lot and pass items for you.

ibar.name: ibar
ibar.description: Display information about yourself and your targets.

hideconsole.name: hideconsole
hideconsole.description: Hides the boot loader used for private servers.

peekaboo.name: peekaboo
peekaboo.description: Allows players to see all objects regardless if they are rendered.

sexchange.name: sexchange
sexchange.description: Allows players to change their race and hair style easily via packets.

synplicity.name: synplicity
synplicity.description: Learns crafts as you perform them and repeats them with ease.

filters.name: filters
filters.description: Allows players to save and load chat filter settings with ease.

autojoin.name: autojoin
autojoin.description: Automatically responds to party invites based on configuration settings. Can automatically join/decline invites or specifically handle them based on the senders name.

instantah.name: instantah
instantah.description: Get the results from your auction house purchase attempts instantly. No more delay waiting to find out if you won an item or not!

stfu.name: stfu
stfu.description: Stfu is an addon that blocks annoying system messages that can often times spam the chat log. It will also convert <call>'s to (call) instead to remove annoying macros.

logs.name: logs
logs.description: Creates log files of all incoming text to the players game client. Log files are named per-character and date they are written to for ease of management.

checker.name: checker
checker.description:
Overrides the response displayed when checking a monster for its difficulty. Colorizes the message based on the type (easy prey, tough, etc.). Also includes displaying monsters levels (including NMs).

For NM levels to show, you must widescan first!

status.name: status
status.description: Tracks party member's debuffs onscreen without needing to target them.

changecall.name: changecall
changecall.description: Allows users to override all incoming calls with a new one instead.

zoom.name: Zoom
zoom.description: Allows users to override the min/max zoom distances (of the mouse wheel) to see closer or further away from their character.

findall.name: findall
findall.description: Searches items stored on all your characters.

mountmuzzle.name: MountMuzzle
mountmuzzle.description: An Ashita v3 addon that allows the user to change or remove the default mount music in Final Fantasy 11 Online.

aspect.name: aspect
aspect.description: Simple addon to better handle the aspect ratio of the game. Allows for non-standard ratios not available via the in-game configuration.

pupatt.name: pupatt
pupatt.description: PUP attachment addon for changing pup attachments per-user profiles. (Only working on retail and only PUP main at the moment.)

watchdog.name: WatchDog
watchdog.description: WatchDog allows users to wide-scan track anything in a zone easily via slash commands.

watchexp.name: WatchExp
watchexp.description: WatchEXP allows you to watch how much EXP or Merit Points you're gaining, as well as shows other information such as time left in abyssea, lights accrued and dynamis time extensions.

servo.name: Servo
servo.description: Allows you to send commands to multiple other characters on the local computer from a single character.

ashitacast.name: AshitaCast
ashitacast.description: A plugin that manages gear swaps.

bellhop.name: Bellhop
bellhop.description: A plugin to facilitate item movement using typed commands.

dressme.name: DressMe
dressme.description: A plugin to automatically gather your gear. Has integration with AshitaCast or can be used alone.

duration.name: Duration
duration.description: A plugin to track buffs you've cast and when they will wear off.

gearlock.name: GearLock
gearlock.description: A plugin to prevent character blinking during equipment swaps.

lootwhore.name: LootWhore
lootwhore.description: A plugin to automatically lot/pass/drop/store items that enter the treasure pool.

shorthand.name: Shorthand
shorthand.description: A plugin to allow more flexible typed commands.

statustimers.name: StatusTimers
statustimers.description: A plugin that shows how long your status effects have been active.

minimap.name: Minimap
minimap.description:
Displays a minimap of the current area on-screen. 
Includes various configurations to customize the minimap and its features.

crafty.name: Crafty
crafty.description: In-game crafting tool to help automate crafting bulk amounts of things. Full in-game UI to make things even easier.

dats.name: Dats
dats.description: Enables users to easily override DAT files without actually replacing them. Loads overrides from a set directory so you do not have to overwrite the original game files.

deeps.name: Deeps
deeps.description:
Miniature damage logging in FFXI for Ashita.
Usage: /load deeps
Monitor can be moved with shift+drag.
Click bars to zoom in, right click to zoom out.
Reset the meters with /dps reset.

greed.name: Greed
greed.description:
World of Warcraft's popular Grid and Clique addons for FFXI.
Usage: /load greed
Use the config XML to edit keybinds, colors, position, anchor point, etc.

no-ckback.name: No-ckback
no-ckback.description: Removes the knockback effect to your player from various abilities performed by enemies.

guildwork.name: Guildwork
guildwork.description: Guildwork.com website interaction built into a plugin! Manage your characters and other information directly within Ashita.

dashcam.name: DashCam
dashcam.description: DashCam allows players to record in-game video with ease.

oseem.name: Oseem
oseem.description: Handles augmenting automatically for Reisenjima equipment.

packer.name: Packer
packer.description: Packer is a full rewrite and replacement of the DressMe plugin with extended features. Packer makes full use of the new packet system for the maximum possible speed.

affinity.name: Affinity
affinity.description: Allows players to set the process affinity mask via a simple in-game command.

hardwaremouse.name: HardwareMouse
hardwaremouse.description: Force-enables a hardware mouse cursor for the game client. (Useful for those using proxies such as dgVoodoo 2 that mess up the cursor.)

multisend.name: MultiSend
multisend.description: Multisend is a replacement for servo. No synchronization is needed, just load and go.

repeat.name: Repeat
repeat.description: New and improved version of the repeater addon.

xipivot.name: XIPivot
xipivot.description: Ashita & Windower 4 addon to allow dynamic loading of Mods without modification of the original DATs.

vnm.name: VNM
vnm.description: Ashita plugin that renders a line in-game between the player and the VNM's position.

ashita.name: Ashitav3-Launcher
ashita.description: The Ashita v3 launcher repository that contains the latest launcher update files.
